title._content: Image taken from page 8 of 'The story of the Persian War, from Herodotus. By ... A. J. Church. With illustrations from the antique'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The story of the Persian War, from Herodotus. By ... A. J. Church. With illustrations from the antique", "English. Selections" Author: Herodotus. Contributor: Church, Alfred John Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9026.bb.10." Page: 8 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1882 Publisher: Seeley, Jackson & Halliday Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001664680 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
